Summary: American Electric Power (AEP) faces direct legislative risk from 1 bill with 8 direct impacts. No indirect risks. Zero-dollar subsidies identified. Overall risk assessed as low to moderate.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with immediate implementation The legislation states: "Termination and restrictions on clean electricity production credit."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "Phase-out and restrictions on advanced manufacturing production credit."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "This section shall not apply to any wind energy component produced and sold after December 31, 2027."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "This section shall not apply to any metallurgical coal produced after December 31, 2029."
